mapper.select: select tpc.id as id, tpc.name as name, tp.name as planName, count(tprac.id) as count from test_plan_report_api_case tprac join test_plan_collection tpc on tprac.test_plan_collection_id = tpc.id and tpc.type = 'API' join test_plan tp on tpc.test_plan_id = tp.id where tprac.test_plan_report_id = #{request.reportId} group by tprac.test_plan_collection_id
select tpac.id from test_plan_api_case tpac inner join api_test_case atc on atc.id = tpac.api_case_id where tpac.test_plan_id = #{id} and atc.deleted = false order by tpac.pos desc
